TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示网页内的一个 HTML 元素。

span.span: Represents an HTML element inside of a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示 HTML 文档中任何可能的元素类型, 如`BODY` `TABLE`、和`FORM`。 represents any possible type of element in an HTML document, such as `BODY`, `TABLE`, and `FORM`, among others. 类公开可在所有元素上找到的最常见属性。The class exposes the most common properties you can expect to find on all elements. 大多数元素可以有*子元素*: 位于它们下面的其他 HTML 元素。Most elements can have *child elements*: other HTML elements that are placed underneath them. 使用属性可测试给定元素是否具有子级, 并使用集合来对其进行循环访问。 Use the property to test whether a given element has children, and the collection to iterate through them. 属性返回当前元素嵌套的。 The property returns the in which the current element is nested. 通常需要访问不直接由公开的基础元素上的特性、属性和方法, 例如`IMG`元素上的`SRC`特性或中的`Submit`方法`FORM`。You often need access to attributes, properties, and methods on the underlying element that are not directly exposed by , such as the `SRC` attribute on an `IMG` element or the `Submit` method on a `FORM`. 使用 和方法可以检索和更改特定元素上的任何属性或属性, 同时提供对未在托管文档对象模型 (DOM) 中公开的任何方法的访问。The and methods enable you to retrieve and alter any attribute or property on a specific element, while provides access to any methods not exposed in the managed Document Object Model (DOM). 如果你的应用程序具有非托管代码权限, 则还可以使用特性访问未公开的属性和方法。If your application has unmanaged code permission, you can also access unexposed properties and methods with the attribute. 使用属性可测试元素是否为特定类型。Use the property to test whether an element is of a specific type. 可以在运行时修改任何 HTML 文档。Any HTML document can be modified at run time. 您可以使用的 方法创建新对象, 并使用或方法将其添加到另一个元素。You can create new objects with the method of , and add them to another element using the or methods. 你还可以将元素创建为 HTML 标记, 并将其分配给现有的元素的属性。You can also create the elements as HTML tags and assign them to an existing element's property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查任意 HTML 文档并派生一个描述 HTML 元素的字符串, 并使用缩进和级别号来指示元素在文档中的嵌套深度。The following code example shows how to examine an arbitrary HTML document and derive a string describing the HTML elements, with indentation and level numbers used to indicate how deeply nested the elements are in the document. 此代码示例要求你的应用程序承载名为`WebBrowser1`的控件。This code example requires that your application hosts a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM), 您可以通过多种方式更改 HTML 文件的运行时内容。The HTML Document Object Model (DOM) enables you to alter the run-time contents of an HTML file in a number of ways. 使用将新元素添加到现有文档, 或在页面上移动元素。Use to add new elements to an existing document, or to move an element on the page. 如果某个元素已经是父级元素, 则向另一个元素追加一个元素将自动从其以前的父元素中移除该元素。If an element has already been parented, appending an element to another element will automatically remove that element from its previous parent. 当你在 控件上调用方法时, 使用在运行时对文档进行的任何添加都不会被保留。Any additions made to a document at run-time using will not be persisted when you call the method on the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法创建一个新的超链接, 并使用`AppendChild` `BODY`元素将其添加到页的末尾。The following code example creates a new hyperlink using the method and adds it to end of a page using `AppendChild` on the `BODY` element. 该示例要求你的应用程序包含一个名`WebBrowser1`为的控件。The example requires that your application contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. summary.span: 为 HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 上的命名事件添加事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler for a named event on the HTML Document Object Model (DOM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管文档对象模型 (DOM) 只公开选定数量的事件。The Managed Document Object Model (DOM) exposes only a select number of events. 大多数未公开事件仅针对特定类型的元素进行定义;例如, `FORM`事件仅对元素有效。 `submit`Most of the unexposed events are only defined for specific types of elements; such as the `submit` event, which is valid only on `FORM` elements. 用于向这些未公开事件添加事件处理程序。Use to add an event handler to these unexposed events. 在文档完成加载之前, 不应将事件附加到文档或其对象之一。You should not attach an event to the document or one of its objects until the document has completed loading. 应最早调用此方法的是在 控件的事件中。The earliest you should call this method is in the event of the control. 有关可用的非托管事件的详细信息, 请参阅[访问托管 HTML 文档对象模型](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md)和 IHTMLElement 接口上的未公开成员:[IHTMLElement](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104876)、 [IHTMLElement2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104877)、 [IHTMLElement3](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104878)、 [IHTMLElement4](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104879)。For more information about the available unmanaged events, see [Accessing Unexposed Members on the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md) and the IHTMLElement interfaces: [IHTMLElement](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104876), [IHTMLElement2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104877), [IHTMLElement3](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104878), [IHTMLElement4](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104879).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些元素 (如`IMG`和`SCRIPT`) 不能具有任何子级。Some elements, such as `IMG` and `SCRIPT`, cannot have any children. 在对任意元素调用或之前, 请使用此属性。Use this property before you call or on an arbitrary element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例对上 的事件进行处理。The following code example handles the event on . 如果先前未使用鼠标单击选定某个元素, 则代码会将该元素分配给名为`MoveElement`的私有类变量。If an element was not previous selected using a mouse click, the code assigns the element to a private class variable named `MoveElement`. 如果选择了某个元素, 则代码会尝试将其追加到刚刚单击的元素中。If an element was selected, the code attempts to append it to the element that was just clicked. 此代码示例要求你的应用程序承载名为`WebBrowser1`的控件, 并且已为该事件添加了事件处理程序。This code example requires that your application hosts a control named `WebBrowser1`, and that you have already added an event handler for the event on . remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 文件中的许多元素在其下可以包含其他 HTML 元素。Many of the elements inside of an HTML file can have other HTML elements underneath them. 集合提供了一种简单的机制来浏览文档的树状结构。The collection provides a simple mechanism for exploring the tree structure of a document. 仅公开其直接父级为当前元素的元素。 only exposes elements whose direct parent is the current element. 如果有一个 `TABLE`元素的, 则将为你提供内的所有`TR` (行) 元素。 `TABLE`If you have an for a `TABLE` element, will give you all of the `TR` (row) elements inside of the `TABLE`. 若要检索`TD`包含在`TR`元素中的 (单元格) 元素, 需要使用每个单个`TR`元素的集合, 或使用上的集合。To retrieve the `TD` (cell) elements contained inside of the `TR` elements, you will need to use either the collection on each individual `TR` element, or use the collection on . 不保证此集合中的元素按源顺序排列。Elements in this collection are not guaranteed to be in source order. 如果为`false` ,`Children`将始终为空。If is `false`, `Children` will always be empty. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查任意 HTML 文档并派生一个描述元素的字符串, 并使用缩进和级别号来指示元素在文档中的嵌套深度。The following code example examines an arbitrary HTML document and derive a string describing the elements, with indentation and level numbers used to indicate how deeply nested the elements are in the document. 为此, 它将`Children`以递归方式搜索所有元素的集合, 从文档顶部的 HTML 元素开始。It does this by searching the `Children` collection of all elements recursively, starting with the HTML element at the top of the document. 此代码示例要求你的应用程序具有一个名`WebBrowser1`为的控件。This code example requires that your application has a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过 `true`将类的属性设置为, 可以取消元素上的事件的默认操作。 You can cancel the default action for a event on an element by setting the property of the class to `true`. 除非您 `true`将类的属性设置为,否则元素上的事件也将出现在该元素的父元素和类本身上。A event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the class itself, unless you set the property of the class to `true`. 如果用户单击当前没有输入焦点的元素, 该事件将在事件之后、该元素发生之前发生。If the user clicks on an element that does not currently have input focus, the event will occur after the event, but before the event for that element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件, 并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件, 请考虑将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码, 请将其粘贴到包含名为 `HtmlElement1`的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlElement1`. 然后, 确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 HTML 页面可以使用`FRAMESET`标记来承载帧。Some HTML pages can host frames using the `FRAMESET` tags. 在这种情况下, `FRAME`每个单个元素都将包含其自己的实例。In this case, each individual `FRAME` element will contain its own instance of . 如果已从中接收到对事件处理程序中的元素的引用, 并且需要对该元素所在的文档执行某些操作, 则此属性最有用。This property is most useful when you have received a reference to an element in an event handler from the , and need to perform some action on the document in which the element resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 Internet Explorer 文档对象模型 (DOM) 的包装器, 它是使用组件对象模型 (COM) 编写的。 is a wrapper for the Internet Explorer Document Object Model (DOM), which is written using the Component Object Model (COM). 如果需要访问基础 COM 接口上的未公开的属性或方法 (例如`IHTMLElement`), 则可以使用此对象来查询它们。If you need to access unexposed properties or methods on the underlying COM interfaces, such as `IHTMLElement`, you can use this object to query for them. 为了使用非托管接口, 需要将 MSHTML 库 (mshtml) 导入到应用程序中。In order to use the unmanaged interfaces, you will need to import the MSHTML library (mshtml.dll) into your application. 但是, 您还可以使用`Invoke`方法执行未公开的属性和方法。However, you can also execute unexposed properties and methods using the `Invoke` method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用非托管接口获取当前选定的文本, 并使用用户选择的 URL 将其转换为超链接。The following code example uses unmanaged interfaces to take the currently selected text and convert it into a hyperlink, with the URL chosen by the user. 此代码的编写假设窗体具有名为`WebBrowser1`的控件, 并且已添加非托管 MSHTML 库作为对项目的引用。This code was written under the assumption that your form has a control named `WebBrowser1`, and that you have added the unmanaged MSHTML library as a reference to your project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 双击由用户操作系统的鼠标设置确定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 用户可以设置两次单击鼠标按钮之间的时间以便将这两次单击认为是双击而不是两次单击。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks. 通过 `true`将类的属性设置为, 可以取消元素上的事件的默认操作。 You can cancel the default action for a event on an element by setting the property of the class to `true`. 除非您 `true`将类的属性设置为,否则元素上的事件也将出现在该元素的父元素和类本身上。A event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the class itself, unless you set the property of the class to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序报告事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件, 并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件, 请考虑将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码, 请将其粘贴到包含名为 `HtmlElement1`的类型的实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlElement1`. 然后, 确保事件处理程序与事件相关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有多种方法可将新元素添加到现有 HTML 页, 如和方法。There are several ways to add new elements to an existing HTML page, such as the and methods. 如果你必须在新元素上设置多个属性或样式, 则使用通常是添加新内容的最快方法。Using is often the fastest way to add new content when you have to set many attributes or styles on your new elements. 与中不同, 其中不包括表示正在调用的对象的 HTML。 differs from in that will not include the HTML that represents the object you are calling. 有关这两个属性之间的差异的详细信息, 请参阅。See for more information about the difference between these two properties. 设置会销毁先前追加到元素的所有子级。Setting destroys any children previously appended to the element. 如果从 DOM 中检索一个元素, 然后将新的 HTML 分配给其父属性, 则对该元素的引用将毫无用处, 在其调用其属性和方法时, 其行为不确定。If you retrieve an element from the DOM and then assign new HTML to its parents' property, your reference to that element will be useless, and its behavior when it calls its properties and methods is undefined. 对于某些元素, 设置不是有效的操作。For some elements, setting is not a valid operation. 某些 HTML 标记没有结束标记, 如`IMG`标记, 因此不能包含嵌套元素。Some HTML tags have no closing tag, such as the `IMG` tag, and therefore cannot contain nested elements. 有些标记, 如`SCRIPT`标记, 只能包含文本内容; 设置将导致错误。Some tags, such as the `SCRIPT` tag, can only contain text content; setting will result in an error. 对于这两种类型的标记 , 属性将`false`返回。For both types of tags, the property will return `false`. 不过, 您也不能设置`TABLE`和`TR`元素, 因为向这些元素分配格式不正确的 HTML 可能会损坏文档的呈现。However, you also cannot set on `TABLE` and `TR` elements, as assigning malformed HTML to these elements could corrupt the rendering of the document. 使用 `TABLE`或非托管接口上`insertCell`的和方法将行和单元格添加到中。`insertRow` `IHTMLTable`Use or the `insertRow` and `insertCell` methods on the unmanaged `IHTMLTable` interface to add rows and cells to a `TABLE`. 如果只需将文本分配给某个元素而不是 HTML 标记, 请改用属性。If you need only to assign text to an element and not HTML markup, use the property instead. 将值赋给将销毁以前使用指定的任何文本值。Assigning a value to will destroy any text values previously assigned using .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可以通过以下三种方式之一将元素定位到 HTML 页: 默认流定位;相对定位, 其中元素相对于其父级的固定量偏移;和绝对定位, 其中, 元素的相对于文档的左上角为固定坐标位置。Elements can be positioned on an HTML page in one of three ways: default flow positioning; relative positioning, in which the element is offset by a fixed amount relative to its parent; and absolute positioning, in which the element is given a fixed coordinate position relative to the upper-left corner of the document. 如果文档的元素使用相对或绝对定位, 则可以使用`OffsetParent`计算工作区中元素的坐标位置。When a document's elements use relative or absolute positioning, you can use `OffsetParent` to calculate an element's coordinate position in the client area. 有关 HTML 中的元素定位的详细信息, 请参阅[关于元素定位](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx)。For more information about element positioning in HTML, see [About Element Positioning](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了和的`span1` `span2`不同之处`span3`:The following code example shows how and differ for `span1`, `span2` and `span3`: ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许发现元素的上下文。The property enables discovery of an element's context. 它在事件处理程序内非常有用, 例如, 可以为文档的对象层次结构中任何位置的任何元素触发。It is most useful inside of event handlers such as , which can fire for any element anywhere in the document's object hierarchy. Html 元素的属性 (html 文档的顶部) 指向自身。 The property of the HTML element (the top of an HTML document) points back to itself. 如果在循环内调用, 请验证循环的中断条件是否与`Parent`属性的类型和属性的类型相比较, 否则, 代码可能会执行无限循环。If you call inside a loop, verify that the loop's break condition compares the type of the current element and the type of the `Parent` property, or else your code may execute an infinite loop. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将查找文档中`IMG`的所有标记, 并使用`IMG`属性来测试是否为超链接到其他页; 如果为`ALT` , 则代码将 URL 分配给`IMG`标记, 以便用户可以将鼠标悬停在图像上, 以查看它的拍摄位置。The following code example finds all of the `IMG` tags in a document, and uses the property to test whether the `IMG` is hyperlinked to another page; if it is, the code assigns the URL to the `ALT` attribute of the `IMG` tag, so that users can mouse over the image to see where it will take them. remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 使用 World Wide Web Consortiums 级联样式表规范中定义的样式来控制元素的显示。The HTML Document Object Model (DOM) uses styles as defined in the World Wide Web Consortiums Cascading Style Sheets specification to control the display of an element. 属性中的样式采用冒号分隔的名称-值对的形式, 每个对用分号分隔, 如下所示:Styles in the property take the form of colon-delimited name-value pairs, with each pair separated by a semicolon, as follows: `style-name1:value1;...;[style-nameN:valueN;]` 若要将`DIV`元素的字体设置为14磅的新罗马粗体, 可以分配以下字符串:To set the font for a `DIV` element to 14-point Times New Roman bold, for example, you would assign the following string: `font-face:Times New Roman;font-size:14px;font-weight:bold;` 有关 HTML DOM 中所有可用样式的完整列表, 请参阅[STYLE 特性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms534651.aspx)。For a full list of all available styles in the HTML DOM, see [STYLE Attribute](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms534651.aspx).
